description: SongDetail page loads and displays song information correctly
steps: Step 1: Navigate to login page at /login
Step 2: Enter test credentials and submit login form
Step 3: Wait for redirect to home page
Step 4: Click on a song from the songs list to navigate to song detail
Step 5: Verify page loads without errors
Step 6: Verify song title displays in header
Step 7: Verify artist name displays below title
Step 8: Verify status badge displays correctly

description: SongDetail song title uses text-3xl font-bold font-serif tracking-tight text-foreground
steps: Step 1: Navigate to song detail page
Step 2: Locate the song title h2 element in the header (Line 401)
Step 3: Inspect computed styles - verify font-size is 1.875rem (30px)
Step 4: Verify font-weight is bold (700)
Step 5: Verify font-family includes Brawler (serif)
Step 6: Verify letter-spacing is tight (-0.025em)
Step 7: Verify text color matches foreground variable

steps: Step 1: Navigate to song detail page

Step 4: Verify font-weight is bold (700)
Step 5: Verify font-family includes Brawler (serif)

description: SongDetail metadata editing saves correctly
steps: Step 1: Navigate to song detail page
Step 2: Click the edit button in the header
Step 3: Modify the song title
Step 4: Modify the BPM value
Step 5: Click Save button
Step 6: Verify changes are persisted
Step 7: Refresh page and verify changes still display

description: SongDetail CHARTS tab allows adding and deleting charts

Step 2: Click on CHARTS tab
Step 3: Click 'Add Chart' button

Step 5: Click 'Create Text Tab' button
Step 6: Verify new chart appears in chart selector
Step 7: Click delete button for the chart

Step 9: Verify chart is removed

description: SongDetail ASSIGNMENTS tab displays all band members

description: SongDetail ASSIGNMENTS tab allows adding roles to members
